page.title: 20Acknowledgements,Ulverston
page.content: The information on Ulverston has been researched by 4th and 6th year pupils in the History and Business Studies Depts. at{Victoria High School and edited by their teachers : Mr.C. Palin,Mrs.E.Kingston,Mr.A.Bradbury; with help from Mr.N.Curry,Mr.D. Whittle,Mr.T.Boyt,Mr.C.Ormerod. Many local people have helped by making available their knowledge and time and we would particularly like to thank the following : Mr.Denham the Town Clerk,Mr.A.Williams of Glaxo, Mrs.Wood of Swarthmoor Hall,Mr.Barrow the Cattle Market Secretary. The following pupils were among those undertaking research: M.Bramall, J.Fieldman,K.Andrews,K.Troughton, S.Harrison,D.Hobba,C.Grantham,A.Vines, H.Fox,A.Netherwood,A.Walker,and many others.
